creator: langohr@gevasys.de
text:
It would be helpful, if to create a zip with the <zip> task and protect the 
archive with a password.
We need this issue to send a protected mail.
We use this on a windows system, but a solution for all platforms would be 
great.

As a stop gap measure until this new task is available.....
I've done this by getting the command line add on for winzip and use the 
<exec> task to zip it up. This uses up to AES256 encryption.

You can use input task to gather the password or pass it in from the command 
line. I wrote a swing ant task that prompts for the password and confirm 
password. Then sets this into a property that can be a parameter into the 
WZZIP.EXE execution.

Just an idea.....
creator: jay@drummondsoftware.com
